downloadTitle: Leveraging the Value of Your Host Systems with Real World SOA
downloadDescription: This document walks you through an example of implementing a real-world SOA by using Microsoft® BizTalk® Server 2006 and the BizTalk Adapters for Host Systems.
detailsSection:
Starting with a concrete business problem, this document attempts to walk the reader through many considerations and different approaches available when integrating with IBM host systems. Following a real world SOA approach, it provides details on how to leverage legacy systems by using Microsoft® BizTalk® Server 2006 and the BizTalk Adapters for Host Systems.

Applies to: Microsoft BizTalk Server 2006, BizTalk Server 2006 R2, and BizTalk Server 2009
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button to start the download.

  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
